summary: The script showcases how to construct, train, and evaluate an Approximate Personalized Propagation of Neural Predictions (APPNP) model for node classification on citation graph datasets, leveraging the MXNet backend of the Deep Graph Library (DGL). It includes model definition, data loading, training loops, and command‑line options for running experiments.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑run example that demonstrates the application of the APPNP graph neural network algorithm for node classification, enabling developers and researchers to quickly prototype, benchmark, and understand the integration of MXNet‑based GNN models within DGL.
